title: Goal-Based Mathematics Learning Design for Adult Professional Trainees

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and job-related data interpretation skills
context.additional_context: Course emphasizing strengthening mathematical thinking to improve workplace efficiency, with motivational design through life goal-linked activities

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three mathematical modeling techniques for solving workplace problems.
Learners present two or more decision-making scenarios based on statistical analysis results.
Learners write reflective journals connecting learning activities to their life goals (e.g., enhancing expertise, expanding social impact).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
